attributes.action: Put average speed cameras on Lightbowne Road, Moston M40.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop racing, stop people driving above the limit, stop deaths, stop accidents, stop idiotic driving.

What more will it take for something to be done on the busy main road.
From start to end and a crossing at the junctions
attributes.background: Average speed check cameras need putting on the road. Too many accidents and deaths have taken place and its not fair anymore. This is our community and this is affecting our community as a whole.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Manchester City Council (MCC), not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a petition on the MCC website calling for this to take place. You can do this here: https://democracy.manchester.gov.uk/ielogon.aspx?lp=1&RPID=3340342&HPID=3340342&Forms=1.
